price: Àti pé má ṣe pè lẹ́yìn Allāhu n̄ǹkan tí kò lè ṣe ọ́ ní àǹfààní, tí kò sì lè kó ìnira bá ọ. Tí o bá ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ nígbà náà, dájúdájú ìwọ ti wà nínú àwọn alábòsí.”
arabic: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَۖ فَإِن فَعَلۡتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذٗا مِّنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tadʿu min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿuka walā yaḍurruka fa-in faʿalta fa-innaka idhan mina al-ẓālimīna
